document.full_text: libya released four new york times journalists on monday, nearly a week after they had been captured by libyan forces while covering the conflict there, although three journalists for other outlets remained missing.
document.title: ny times journalists released from libyan custody
lines_and_colors: libya released four new york times journalists on monday, nearly a week after they had been captured by libyan forces while covering the conflict there, although three journalists for other outlets remained missing.
